sent_1.text: METHODS : Cancer patients ( n = 432 ) were randomly assigned to either usual care or a National Institutes of Health ( NIH ) physician - based smoking intervention .

entity_3.text: National Institutes of Health ( NIH ) physician - based smoking intervention

sent_2.text: The primary outcome was 7 - day point prevalence abstinence at 6 and 12 months after study entry .
